description: This file contains data models for representing graph nodes, relationships, and related API request/response structures in a Dart application. It appears to be part of a frontend or client library interfacing with a graph-based API, with classes for serialization and deserialization of JSON data.

classes.name: Node
classes.description: Represents a graph node with id, label, and optional type.

classes.name: Relationship
classes.description: Represents an edge between two nodes with a specified relationship type.

classes.name: GraphResult
classes.description: Encapsulates a list of nodes and relationships; used for graph data exchange.

classes.name: ConvertRequest
classes.description: Encapsulates a request for converting data, specified via URL or raw content.

classes.name: ConvertResponse
classes.description: Contains the job ID for an asynchronous conversion operation.

methods.name: Node.fromJson
methods.description: Factory method to create a Node instance from JSON data.

methods.name: Node.toJson
methods.description: Converts a Node instance to a JSON-compatible map.

methods.name: Relationship.fromJson
methods.description: Factory method to create a Relationship instance from JSON data.

methods.name: Relationship.toJson
methods.description: Converts a Relationship instance to a JSON-compatible map.

methods.name: GraphResult.fromJson
methods.description: Factory method to create a GraphResult from JSON data, parsing nodes and relationships.

methods.name: GraphResult.toJson
methods.description: Converts a GraphResult to JSON format.

methods.name: GraphResult.prettyJson
methods.description: Returns a pretty-printed JSON string of the graph data.

methods.name: ConvertRequest.toJson
methods.description: Produces JSON representation of the request, including url or content if provided.

methods.name: ConvertResponse.fromJson
methods.description: Factory method to create a ConvertResponse from JSON data, extracting jobId.
